name: @revenuecat/purchases-capacitor-ui
description: UI components for RevenueCat Capacitor SDK
author: RevenueCat, Inc.

scripts.verify: npm run verify:ios && npm run verify:android && npm run verify:web
scripts.verify:ios: xcodebuild -scheme RevenuecatPurchasesCapacitorUi -destination generic/platform=iOS && npm run verify:ios:cocoapods
scripts.verify:ios:cocoapods: cd ios/CocoapodsInstallationTest && pod install && xcodebuild -workspace CocoapodsInstallationTest.xcworkspace -scheme CocoapodsInstallationTest -destination 'generic/platform=iOS' CODE_SIGNING_ALLOWED=NO CODE_SIGNING_REQUIRED=NO CODE_SIGN_IDENTITY="" build
scripts.verify:android: cd android && ./gradlew clean build test && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run prettier -- --check
scripts.fmt: npm run eslint -- --fix && npm run prettier -- --write
